clinical_study.brief_title: Trimethoprim/Sulfamethoxazole Combined With Caspofungin as First-line Therapy in PCP
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective Randomized Controlled Study to Compare Efficacy of Caspofungin Combined With Trimethoprim-sulfamethoxazole Versus Trimethoprim/Sulfamethoxazole as First-line Therapy in Non-HIV Patients With Severe Pneumocystis Pneumonia

brief_summary.textblock:
This is a prospective, randomized clinical trial. During the study, non-HIV patients who are admitted to ICU due to Pneumocystic pneumonia (PCP) and have not received anti-PCP therapy or have received therapy less than 48hrs will be randomized (1:1) to received caspofungin combined with trimethoprim-sulfamethoxazole or trimethoprim-sulfamethoxazole alone.
The aim of this study is to compare the effectiveness of caspofungin combined with trimethoprim-sulfamethoxazole with that of conventional therapy (trimethoprim-sulfamethoxazole alone) as first-line therapy in the treatment of severe Pneumocystis pneumonia (PCP) in non-HIV patients.

primary_outcome.description: The percentage of subjects death at study day 28. Those subjects discharged from ICU prior to day 28 were counted as alive at day 28

secondary_outcome.description: defined as the number of days between randomization and day 28 in which the patient is not in the ICU (for any part of a day)

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Ventilator Free Days to day 28
secondary_outcome.description: Ventilator-free days is defined to be 28 days minus the duration of mechanical ventilation through day 28. Participants who do not survive to day 28 are assigned zero ventilator-free days.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through ICU discharge, an average of 14 days
secondary_outcome.description: The percentage of death subjects at ICU discharge

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through hospital discharge, an average of 28 days
secondary_outcome.description: The percentage of death subjects at hospital discharge
the change of PO2/FiO2 between baseline and day7, 21
the change of (1,3)-β-D glucan level between baseline and day3, 7, 21

secondary_outcome.measure: PCP-DNA negative conversion rate in alveolar lavage fluid on day 7 after randomization
secondary_outcome.description: the percentage of PCP-DNA negative after 7days treatment
respiratory dysfunction assessed by Sequential Organ Failure Assessment (SOFA) score for respiratory system
the change of cytokines in bronchoalveolar lavage fluid (BALF) level between baseline and day7, day21
incidence, duration and severity of adverse events
incidence, duration and severity of serious adverse events

intervention.description: caspofungin 70mg ivdrip the first day, then 50mg ivdrip qd for 21days
40mg ivdrip q12h for 5 days , then 40mg ivdrip qd for 5 days , 20mg for 11 days

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Age ≥ 18 years old
2. Non-HIV immunosuppressed patients admitted to the ICU
3. confirmed or suspect PCP
3) Not receiving anti-PCP treatment or anti-PCP treatment < 48 hours
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Age less than 18 years old
2. Known pregnancy
3. allergy to TMP/SMZ or caspofungin
4. Decision to withhold life-sustaining treatment
5. Patients with advanced pulmonary fibrosis
6. severe liver dysfunction(Child-Pugh C )
